name: Polar Walk
description:
Polar Walk

Polar walk is a walking/hiking simulator where you walk to the center of north pole.

Features!
  • A great game to watch some videos, movies or TV shows. Heck you can even read a book while playing!
  • Have a relaxing time with your drone friend Bernard.
  • Beautiful environments.
  • A realistic walking speed of 5 km/h.
  • Wonderful music by Patricia Taxxon (https://patriciataxxon.bandcamp.com/album/traveller)

twitter: https://twitter.com/kunstaat
